charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] came across
Sycamore and Dexio chatting in town...
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_0300_:
Are you heading out for the day? How marvelous!
Perhaps I’ll stop by a few cafés...
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_0400_:
After all, it seems Dexio here also has plans for
the day.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_0401_0600_:
Yes, Professor Sycamore and I know each other
from Kalos.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_0900_:
Professor Sycamore’s the one who gave me a
Pokédex before I headed out on my journey
around Kalos, you know.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_1000_:
You could say I was a bit of a mentor to Serena
and her friends.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_1100_:
He was actually helping me investigate something
just now. Thanks again for that, Dexio!
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_0401_1300_:
Just something we’re personally keen to look
into—that’s all.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_0402_1500_:
There’s just something we’re personally keen to
look into, though I wouldn’t call it “research”...
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_1600_:
At the very least, I don’t think there’s anything else
I need help with for now.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_1700_:
In that case, I’ll focus on enjoying my vacation
here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_1800_: Oh? What about Sina? Isn’t she going with you?
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_1900_:
Oh, you know her. She’s already a step ahead of
me, out seeing Pasio.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_2000_: I guess she just couldn’t wait.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_2100_:
Sina’s another one of the Trainers who got a
Pokédex from the professor and went on a journey
around Kalos.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_2200_:
She’s been so excited lately, talking about all the
new things she wants to try on Pasio, and—
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_2600_: I guess she’s already found something new!
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_2700_: I see. Espeon must’ve had a vision of that.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_2800_: Well then, I guess I’ll say good-bye here.
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_2900_: Very good. Go on and enjoy Pasio to its fullest!
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_3100_:
Please reach out anytime you need something,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0188_00_dexio/2301_1201_3200_:
As a veteran Pokémon Trainer, I’ll rush over to
help in a heartbeat!
